typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HospitalData
Select1 split( and(equals(indicator, "Daily hospital occupancy"), equals(source, "Surveillance")),
	and(equals(indicator, "Daily hospital occupancy"),notEquals(source, "Surveillance")),
	and(equals(indicator, "Daily ICU occupancy"), equals(source, "Surveillance")),
	and(equals(indicator, "Daily ICU occupancy"),notEquals(source, "Surveillance")),
	and(equals(indicator, "Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k"), equals(source, "Surveillance")),
	and(equals(indicator, "Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k"),notEquals(source, "Surveillance")),
	and(equals(indicator, "Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k"), equals(source, "Surveillance")),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DailyHospitalSurveillance, DailyHospitalOthers, DailyICUSurveillance, DailyICUOthers, WeeklyNewSurveillance, WeeklyNewOthers, WeeklyICUSurveillance, WeeklyICUOthers)
HospitalData select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		date,
		year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit1@DailyICUOthers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DailyICUOthers.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DailyICUOthers
ConditionalSplit1@DailyHospitalSurveillance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DailyHospitalSurveillance'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DailyHospitalSurveillance
ConditionalSplit1@DailyHospitalOthers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DailyHospitalOthers.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DailyHospitalOthers
ConditionalSplit1@DailyICUSurveillance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DailyICUSurveillance.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DailyICUSurveillance
ConditionalSplit1@WeeklyNewOthers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WeeklyNewOthers.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeeklyNewOthers
ConditionalSplit1@WeeklyNewSurveillance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WeeklyNewSurveillance.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeeklyNewSurveillance
ConditionalSplit1@WeeklyICUSurveillance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WeeklyICUSurveillance.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeeklyICUSurveillance
ConditionalSplit1@WeeklyICUOthers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WeeklyICUOthers.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeeklyICUOthers
